actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

official_title: A bill deeming a sailing vessel owned by the San Diego Council of the Boy Scouts of America to have been built in the United States for purposes of qualification for the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs that, for purposes of its certification for operation in the coastwise trade, a named vessel be deemed to have been built in the United States.

titles.title: A bill deeming a sailing vessel owned by the San Diego Council of the Boy Scouts of America to have been built in the United States for purposes of qualification for the coastwise trade.
